GAME DESCRIPTION :

- In this game the amount of enemy will be minimum . You need to collect the right item in order to proceed further, otherwise you will get stuck. There are a lot of traps, so watch your step . Some damage factors can kill the Player instantly, some will damage it . There are many secret passages, so destroy the correct object to make your way through . Also there are healing items that will restore the Player's Health for 100% . NOTE : This game will be a Demo Version, so the audience will be able to play it for free and without any ADS. The purpose of this Demo is to see the User Experience, to see if the user like the game, or dislike, what could be improved, or report any bugs.
